channel.title: Daily News Feed Update #1
channel.description: Daily collected titles from multiple sources

item.title: English Editorials (Update #1) • Trump’s peace plan and a Turkish- Arab role for Palestine • Israel’s illegal interception of Gaza Flotilla must be resisted
Magazines (Update #1) • Is Dark Energy Born inside Black Holes?

International (Update #1) • ‘The fear was immense’: al-Shabaab exploits fragmented politics to reclaim land in Somalia • Japan poised to get first female PM after Sanae Takaichi wins ruling party leadership • Australia news live: Liberal frontbencher backs Hastie on immigration; Mark Latham threatens legal action after police escort him from Randwick racecourse • Hot public holiday expected for Sydney and Brisbane after record rain for parts of NSW and Queensland in September • ‘Baudin’s or bauxite?’ Stark warning black cockatoo won’t survive mining expansion • ‘Time is running out’: Sportsbet offered share of $1m in bonus bets if customers gambled on AFL grand final day • Bodies of two women who died in Victorian high country might have been there ‘two or three days’, police say • Israel accused of detaining Greta Thunberg in infested cell and making her hold flags • Populist billionaire Andrej Babiš wins Czech parliamentary election • Person killed in drone attack as Ukraine accuses Russia of targeting passenger trains • London’s royal parks closed due to strong winds; Scotland hit by power cuts and travel disruption – Storm Amy as it happened • Europe needs to ‘get serious’ about threat posed to it by Russia, Ukraine minister says • Trump says Gaza peace deal ‘very close’ as Israel continues airstrikes • ‘I feel like we are in a trap’: Gaza residents hopeful but wary of Trump’s plan • Israel orders military to halt Gaza City campaign but continues strikes on the territory • Airstrikes reported in Gaza despite Trump’s call for Israel to stop bombing ‘immediately’ – as it happened • Police make almost 500 arrests at Palestine Action protest in London • St Helens given police escort after ‘terrorist threat’ made during Hull KR match • Police given permission to hold Manchester synagogue attack suspects until Wednesday • Storm Amy: man dies in Ireland as new weather warning issued for UK • Watchdog cleared ex-Tory minister to work for offshoot of firm linked to China surveillance • Trump authorizes national guard deployment to Chicago, White House says, as border patrol there shoots woman • Judge blocks Trump administration from deploying national guard to Portland • Ex-NFL player and Fox Sports star Mark Sanchez arrested after being stabbed • US treasury considers special $1 Trump coin reading ‘fight, fight, fight’ • Kristi Noem warns immigrants away from Super Bowl: ‘We’ll be all over that place’
